d upwards at Arrow's face...)

                    MCGOWAN / BARRYMO=

                    (McGowan =
jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires a missile at Nightlight.)



      =
              (Barrymore takes one of the energy balls to the chest but dod=
ges the other with a side jump. She fires 6 laser beams at Nightlight.)



=
                    (Depp is struck by both energy balls, taking them in th=
e left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Nightlight.)



                    =
(Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pin from a grenade and throws it i=
n front of the Chivtron base.)



                    (Stiller growls and f=
ires an arrow at Arrow.)



                    (Lee fires a ball of fire a=
t Nightlight's legs, attempting to trip her up.)



                    (Vi=
rgo fires a red energy draining dart at Nightlight...)
